author: Jennifer Levitz
title: Fight at Berkshire Museum Doesn’t Look Like a Norman Rockwell Painting
text:
STOCKBRIDGE, Mass.—It’s a scene that Norman Rockwell never would have painted.
A local museum, saying it is struggling to stay afloat, wants to sell off Rockwell paintings here in the very heart of Rockwell country, a plan that is dividing the community.

“This is a betrayal,” said Geoffrey Rockwell, 58, and the eldest grandson of Mr. Rockwell,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
